page.title: 15All Saints Church Marsworth
page.content: 1086 Manor held by Ralph Basset 1190 1st Church built by Thurston Basset. Present building:14th,15th, 16th centuries.16th Century Church given to Trinity College Cambridge :held until the beginning of this century.Church now in a combined Benefice:Cheddington,Mentmore Marsworth Incumbant:Rev.Richard Caink. Electoral Roll 39,Average Congregation 44,Communicants 26,Collections Â£23 Marriages 4,Funerals 3,Baptisms 6. Income Â£5624: Expenditure Â£3317 Monthly services Communion 3,Evensong 1,Family Service 1. Harvest Festival Traditionally Autumn Thursday evening/Supper.Eucharist Sunday following. Christmas Midnight Mass:Alternates between 3 Benefice Churches. Â£25,000 raised by Marsworth people for Restoration in 1977.Â£50000 required.
